title: GEOG 510: GIS and Spatial Analysis in Public Health
text:
Instructor: Varun Goel
Lectures: Monday, Wednesday 2:20 pm - 3:35pm
Location: Callcott 302
Student Support Hours: Mon 11am - 12pm, Thu 2 - 4pm, Fri 2 - 3pm
Location: 111 Callcott
